name: Kobold's Lair
description:
The lord of the Kobolds has been abducting children to fuel dark magic. As a mighty and powerful wizard you must stop him, to prove yourself the greatest hero of all time! Unfortunately, your long-term rival has also come to save the children, and you don't want him stealing all your glory.

Navigate the arena and rescue the children by holding A.

Make sure you watch out. While the attacks of the local kobolds are far too insignificant to harm a powerful wizard such as yourself, getting hit will damage your ego, forcing you to retreat for a short time. If both of you retreat, game over.

#KNOWN BUGS#

Starting a new game after one has finished will break the game. A restart is necesarry.

If once in game the controllers seem to be controlling both characters, the solution is quit the game, restart it with one controller plugged in, and once in the menu plug the second controller in.
